LanguageData.USAC_Bond_Desc: A special type of paper made of high-strength fibers, a physical registered certificate issued by USAC corporate dealers in transactions with the ground forces. Its surface is printed with special ink, featuring exquisite anti-counterfeiting marks and the registered owner's information. \n\nAfter the acquisition of goods and the sale of equipment, the remaining residual value can be used to purchase this certificate with fixed purchasing power for the next transaction. Because the certificate is registered, it cannot be used by anyone other than the registered owner. Therefore, this highly durable piece of paper is of virtually no practical use to other factions in the Edge World.
LanguageData.USAC_Currency_Desc: Total value of currency used in transactions with USAC merchants. Includes the value of body bags and credit bonds. USAC traders only accept body bags and credit bonds as currency. Bonds are consumed first during transactions; body bags are consumed only when bonds are insufficient (starting with the lowest value).
